Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory730.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noan', 3: 'This is the stage. It looks like a place for a wedding.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Noan gazes at the stage with admiration.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'I remember attending several weddings at places like this in the past.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Wedding between traveling merchants?', 3: '8'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'Yeah. Traveling merchants, workers in bases... people who stayed on the surface.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'Those abandoned churches were dark and dilapidated with some occasional Corrupted. It was a completely different vibe.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'That must be so dangerous.', 3: '12'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'Dangerous as they may be, people would still have weddings, and we would still attend.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'Surviving the apocalypse is a grand yet tiresome endeavor... which is why people would want to make beautiful memories.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "You're also here despite how busy you are because you want to make some good memories, aren't you?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'What about you, Noan?', 3: '18'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: "I'm also glad that you invited me.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The often-direct young man pauses, turning his gaze away from you, hesitating to speak.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Hearing you, Noan looks at you earnestly and chuckles with slight embarrassment.'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'When I first saw you, I wanted to say...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'This is lovely.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'Can I pinch your costume?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noan', 3: 'Then... can I hug it as well?', 4: '1'}
